paymentLink.alert: Please note that this is a sandbox page and it's not possible to create test payments on this page. Instead, use the merchant simulations in the Explorer API.
paymentLink.cardNotSupported: {cardType} cards are not supported. Please try with another card.
paymentLink.cardNotSupported.withCardTyp: {cardType} cards are not supported. Please try with another card.
paymentLink.cardNotSupported.withoutCard: Your card isn't supported. Please try with another card.
paymentLink.error.subtitle:
We couldn't process your payment with Swan.
Please try again or contact Customer Support.
paymentLink.error.title: Something went wrong.
paymentLink.name: Name
paymentLink.success.subtitle:
Your payment was successful.
You can close this window.
paymentLink.success.title: Thanks!
paymentLink.termsAndConditions: By clicking Pay, you're agreeing to a direct debit mandate electronically. The mandate authorizes: (1) {merchantName} to share payment information with Swan, and (2) Swan to debit your account accordingly. Refund requests will be processed according to your bank's terms and conditions.
